sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { addTocart } from '../actions/cartActions' import {useSelector ,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' function Cartscreen() { const cartstate = useSelector(state => state.cartReducer) const cartItems = cartstate.cartItems const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

My Cart

{cartItems.map(item=>{ return

{item.name} [{item.varient}]

Price:{item.quantity} * {item.prices[0][item.varient]} = {item.price}

Quantity:

{dispatch(addTocart(item, item.quantity+1, item.varient))}}> {item.quantity}
})}
) } export default Cartscreen
